website_summaries.verdict: Wired headphones  with frequency range 10 hertz to 20 kilohertz, designed more like a hi-fi speaker than typical headphones.
pros: This series by B&W features a driver designed more like a hi-fi speaker than headphones, i.e
consistent volume of air around drive units, for more accurate, clear, and balanced sound
Detachable ear pads made of quality sheep's leather, cover ear completely and block out external sound
Can be folded for compactness and stored or carried in included quilted case
cons: There were a few complaints about Bluetooth connectivity with the wireless model
Comfort issues with the headset over longer periods of listening

website_summaries.verdict: The Bowers & Wilkins P7 may not the best headphone you can buy in its luxury price range, but it certainly is among the best, with excellent build quality and rich sound that works well with a wide range of music genres and sources.
pros: The Bowers & Wilkins P7 offers impressive build quality, good comfort, and smooth, rich, well-balanced sound in an over-the-ear headphone design that shuts out a lot of external noise
The earpads are removable and there's an extra cable with a built-in mic and volume control that turns the P7 into an Apple-friendly headset, and a protective carrying case
cons: leather earpads will cause your ears to get steamy on warmer days
some remote features may not work with Android or Windows devices

customer_reviews.title: They are exceptionally great in sound
customer_reviews.text: They are exceptionally great in sound, design, and material quality. They do not deserve even to be compare to beat's one. Out of comparison. No or extremely little sound manipulation, unique design, high quality leather, and replaceable ear pad (if you ever need that). Bowers and Wilkins truly delivered. i have mine for more than 2 yrs and i am completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: tonyaris

customer_reviews.title: Terrific sound, high-quality materials
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of the old B&W 802 FS speakers and I really like the sound from them, so I decided to give these headphones a try. They sound terrific. I've listened to to flac files and LPs with them. Everything sounds very clear and accurate. The materials and construction are very high-end. They are tighter on my head than I'd like, but it's not a problem. I also think the ear pads should be a little wider to completely cover my ears. Overall I'm really happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: SilverSurfer

customer_reviews.title: If you don't need NC, it is an audiophile's dream headphone for daily commute.
customer_reviews.text: All my head phones are variety of Sennheiser's. I like the phones that produce the original sound quality from the source without adding too much artificial manipulations. B&W P7 meets all my sound quality preference. It is warm, clear, perfect balanced hi, mid and low. It performs well all genres. The only thing missing is the noise cancelling. But it never claims it does. So if you don't care about taking it on frequent air travels, look no farther.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L.

customer_reviews.title: Insanely great. Worth every penny if you are an audiophile ...
customer_reviews.text: Insanely great. Worth every penny if you are an audiophile and travel a lot on planes. They just create a monsoon of sound. You hear things in songs you’ve loved for 20 years that you’ve never noticed. Wireless power lasts for over 15 hours, and there’s a wired option for when you finally run out of juice. The wired option could be a little more elegant, but whatever. Only other nitpick is that they are a little bulky. So they take up a considerable amount of space in my travel bag versus the B&W wired P5s that I used to use. Love these headphones to the moon and back!
customer_reviews.author: craig

customer_reviews.title: Ordered it when I was drunk. Must of been ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it when I was drunk. Must of been crazy to buy $400 headphones. Tried it out since it was already paid for. Still listening to it everyday after a month.
customer_reviews.author: brad choe

customer_reviews.title: They actually do sound better then Bose by a lot
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised these headphones sounded so much better than my Bose, B and O’ , Beats and and the rest that are popular. On some songs I listen to with these on it doesn’t even sound like the same song, that’s not a complaint. I kinda wish I had gotten this years model but in any event these sound terrific, at least I know what brand to buy from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Jason MP

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: These are the absolute best headphones I've ever had. I've owned them for 2 or 3 years now, and the quality has not diminished. They fit comfortably over the ears and enhance the music quality (especially treble) to such an incredible degree, it's like I'm listening to something completely new when it's an old favorite song of mine. Would recommend 5000%. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Raksin

customer_reviews.title: Made Me Listen to Music Once Again
customer_reviews.text: I have a large collection of music, 700+ CDs that I hardly listen to. Ever since I purchased the B&W P7, my iPhone is filled with music and I take my P7 where ever I go. I used to look at people who would walk around with over-the-head headsets and wonder why would anyone do this? Can't they just listen at home. Now I am one! The music with the P7 sounds so clear and crisp it makes me want to listen and enjoy my music all the time.
customer_reviews.author: The Critic

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product. I have a pair of IEMs (RHA ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I have a pair of IEMs (RHA T20i), however they seem to become uncomfortable for long listening experiences. Also, I needed a pair of wireless headphones. This is the most expensive piece of music equipment which I have purchased, however, they are totally worth it. They look classy, they sound amazing. They do tend to get hot over a period of long listening. Also, they are little heavy. Apart from these things, amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Rai

customer_reviews.title: B&W  knows how to make a high end headphone.
customer_reviews.text: These are simply amazing. I agreed with other reviews, that you will hear details in songs you probably heard 50 plus times before and now will become unhidden. B&W knows how to make a high end headphone. They are solid, feel comfortable and sound well balanced.
customer_reviews.author: E. Moisa

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound, comfortable, and classy!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding sound quality. Better than my former Bose Noise Canceling headphones. The passive noise canceling does work but isn't really noise canceling. However, the leather is nice and the look is beautiful. These are well made and classy headphones!
customer_reviews.author: Nulife4rak

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bluetooth headphones
customer_reviews.text: This is the best portable headphones I've ever had. They produce great warm sound, as most of the B&W products do. They are built like tanks, but very light and the leather is very soft, so they are fitting very comfortably on the head. They do not have noise-cancellation, but noise-isolation is fairly good. The battery lasts for for than ten hours (never ran it down so far) and recharging is fast (half an hour or so). On the negative they are enormous even when folded, so pack a big bag.
customer_reviews.author: G. Yakovlev

customer_reviews.title: They are not over the ear, atleast for me
customer_reviews.text: I like the sound and build quality of the headphones but you cannot enjoy something which you can't even wear for more than 15 minutes. Since they are designed to be over ear they apply a lot of clamping pressure to isolate noise. If you have average or slightly above average ear size these are the most uncomfortable headphones you will ever come across. I really liked the way they sounded, they had bass but it doesn't affect other frequencies/vocals. I really wish they were slightly more comfortable to wear, I would have stuck with them.
customer_reviews.author: Satya

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Headphones with amazing sound quality....
customer_reviews.text: These are the best Bluetooth headphones I have ever owned. They are huge and can be stiff at first, but they break in and have amazing sound. Switching on and off is so easy and the quality is insane. I guess my only wish would b e that they were easier to carry around in their case, but the headphones are so big it is a trade-off. The price is a bit high, but you will be impressed with the effort B&W has put into these. I highly recommend for anyone on the fence about buying.
customer_reviews.author: jabdigital

customer_reviews.title: Wow wee!
customer_reviews.text: It is as if one has languished for an entire life time and the lushness and joy of music has at long last been heard. And the beauty of them is akin to a Rolls Royce in the Art Deco age. They even have that new car perfume. I so worried that I didn't have the right/true recordings (Gigo?) that other reviewers cautioned was needed to obtain the full performance. I'm sitting here listening through my iPad to Pandora and am in pure tee heaven. And the other blessing is to have a son who forked over some of the moolah so his old Ma could experience all of this. It is to be reborn.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dyess

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sounding headphones
customer_reviews.text: This is the best sounding wireless headphones I've heard, It's a bit heavy but balanced and not uncomfortable, there is a good balance between weight and clamp. Battery life is average. Leather pads are so soft and covers the whole ear. The only issue is that there is a glue like material on the inside around the speakers. it sticks to the pads, that it becomes hard to remove them, for now it is not much but i'm afraid it becomes worse over time.
customer_reviews.author: Raedtalha

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Batt life is amazing - 10 Sound quality - 8.5 Overall quality - 10 Comfort - 10
customer_reviews.author: Meeee

customer_reviews.title: The sound profile and battery life of these is great. However
customer_reviews.text: The sound profile and battery life of these is great. However... the mic quality on calls is terrible, and there is no side-tone on calls, so you have to take one side off to hear your own voice. Passive noise isolation is good, and the comfort is great, but the newer model has ANC (active noise cancelation) and is probably the better buy at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nicest pair of headphones I have ever own, however, not sure if they are worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty amazing headphones, they are the most expensive pair I have owned, a few years ago I had the Beats Dr. Dre Studio DJ's which were horrible. These are very nice but I'm not sure if they are really worth the sales price, they are comfortable but some of the audio is a little muddy at times and for the price, I thought they would be a life-changing experience and I don't feel it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephan

customer_reviews.title: Like 'em so much I bought two!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of P7s. First we're not recertified. I use one pair for 6+ hours a day at work and wanted a pair for home and saw this great deal. I spent many hours comparing every high-end headphones I could get my hands on. In the end I went with the P7s and have not regretted it. Superb sound and amazing comfort, especially considering how many hours a day I wear them. The leather is super soft. My recertified pair look brand new. No blemishes. Remember I have another non recertified pair to compare them against.
customer_reviews.author: todd asher

customer_reviews.title: Tremendous!
customer_reviews.text: Gave these to my son for Christmas; he finds them to be absolutely outstanding. He's studying Acoustical Engineering, with a minor in music, and seems to know his stuff (he could write a very technical review, far beyond my ability). I've listened to them; they're clear as a bell, the best sound I've ever heard. Expensive, but worth it. Very well made, very substantial in your hands.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Libertyville

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sounding Headphones
customer_reviews.text: These headphones sound great. They have a very balanced sound with good bass, midrange, and highs. The headphones to my ears sound significantly better than the P5 headphones - stronger bass and and a little flatter frequency response in the treble region. The headphones fit OK over my ears. People with large ears need to try these on before buying as they may be too small to cover the ear. In this price range these headphones are clearly at the top of the pack. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: J. White

customer_reviews.title: Superior Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality in these headphones is outstanding. Deep bass. Good stereo surround sound. No distortion at high volume. No sound defects in the ear pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Sash Lutes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect except for headband, TRRS
customer_reviews.text: It'd take a while to List all the good things about these, so I'll only say where they can improve. 1) The thin, firm headband limits how long I can use these. Puts a lot of force on a small area of my standard-shaped head. 2) The 3.5mm TRRS connector is a rigid tube for 1 inch until the strain relief portion of the cord starts. TRRS are specifically meant to be used with smartphones and laptops, where low profile, right angle connectors are worth many sacrifices. Don't let Beats outthink you, Bowers & Wilkins!
customer_reviews.author: Jerome

customer_reviews.title: Best wireless headphones I have ever heard
customer_reviews.text: Best wireless headphones I have ever heard. I have Bose QC35 also and the P7's are better sounding and much louder than the Bose. Bose are great for noise cancelling, but if your laying around at home the B&W P7's are the best!
customer_reviews.author: Randall T.

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Met expectations for sound quality and ease of use. The design is beautiful and build quality is high. They are a bit tight for me and after an hour or so I need to take them off for a while, which is unfortunate.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Traylor

customer_reviews.title: Not much to complain about
customer_reviews.text: I am really impressed with these headphones. Just slightly bass-heavy, which I like. The rest of the range is clear and beautiful. These also have lots of volume headroom, unlike other headphones like the Momentums. Noise isolation is among the best. If you are worried about others hearing your music, no need to worry with these. Also the controls are very well designed and placed - much above average. The bluetooth connects very quickly and consistently. Finally, the look awesome. Craftsmanship is top-notch. Love them !!!
customer_reviews.author: G Funk

customer_reviews.title: Bad experience
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as what I THOUGHT I was getting them for a bargain and wanted to hear how they sounded..when I got ‘em they were missing charging cable, carrying case, and they looked super old..not worth the 300 I paid for ‘em
customer_reviews.author: marcus37

customer_reviews.title: Really great sound
customer_reviews.text: So impressed with these headphones. They really bring the music to life. I first tested these at a store at an airport. So amazed at the sound quality had to get a pair for myself. I also have Bose noise cancel which are really great but wanted something without the noise cancellation. These blew me away.
customer_reviews.author: Joe joe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect package
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace a pair of P5's that were stolen. Loved the P5's but I wanted to try an over-the-ear style of headphone. These are all I had hoped for. Wasn't sure if I would like the wireless aspect but the sound, controls and battery life are exceptional. I love things that are well made and have performance to match. I do not consider myself an audiophile and can't give anyone an in-depth analysis of this pair over another. All I can say is that they fill the bill for me and lack nothing. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Brian N

customer_reviews.title: amazing sound in a gorgeous package
customer_reviews.text: OMG I love them. I owned the P3 and still own the C5 which is also amazing. I don't get the hype with Beats headphones, I have tried them and I really don't like the sound. These guys are really comfortable to wear, block a lot of outside noise (they are not noise canceling). They fold and come with a carrying case, it's a decent size but great for travel and long flights. Or even at home.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan D

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these headphones. There is an immediate connection between the headset and my phone when I turn on the headset. The ability to connect to two devices at a time is great. At work, I connect to both my phone and my computer. If I'm playing music from my computer and I receive a phone call, the music stops and I hear the call through the headset. I find it great, but if you don't like that, you can always disconnect from one of the devices. I haven't worn anything else that is as comfortable and sounds as good as these.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan

customer_reviews.title: They have a break in period
customer_reviews.text: When you get these headphones you might be slightly disappointed with the sound quality. However, after about a week of listening they really break in, and they start to sound amazing. They begin to produce more accurate and warm bass, along with allowing more detail in the highs. These are the best headphones I have ever heard.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Lepard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They sounded great and the Build quality is superyacht standard great product.
customer_reviews.author: Helpful shopper !

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound quality - P7 manages to keep details and ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound quality - P7 manages to keep details and dynamics of original sound. B&W design team did a very good job to combine great look (one of the best looking headphones) with very comfortable fit. I use P7 for hours without feeling any discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Igor Polyakov

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about the p7. Audio dreaming. Takes music to a new level.
customer_reviews.author: peter g.

customer_reviews.title: If they're in your price range don't hesitate!
customer_reviews.text: These sound so good! I'm not a headphone expert or anything but I am into good audio. The best pair I'd owned before these are the Grado SR80s. These are definitely better sounding. I'm thrilled with them and highly recommend them. I did try the P3 and P5; the Sennheiser Momentum and HD558, the v-moda crossfades m-100s, and these are by far better than all of them.
customer_reviews.author: DomYan

customer_reviews.title: It's B & W...means it's good.
customer_reviews.text: Better than my AKG's. They have better bass response and a better mid-bass/mid-range. Comfortable fit. I use them for music, movies, and gaming. If you can dish out the money for them without blinking, I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: The Sanman 1111

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones I ever owned. I choose not to listen from any other headphone. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mert Ozer

customer_reviews.title: Top notch
customer_reviews.text: Very excellent product, wonderful sounds. Super comfortable. Just beware of Amazon's shipping method.
customer_reviews.author: CalFord

customer_reviews.title: Love these. Worried since I had not tried them ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Worried since I had not tried them before buying. Similar sound to other B&W headphones. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Leroy W Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Stunning! Way better than P5 and other headphones that I tried!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item after using it in an apple store. I have used AKG 545 before and other well-known headphones for try-out. But B&W P7 is the greatest headphone! I tried to compare it with P5 in order to see if there are any real differences, and in fact, the differences are clear. I could not spend my own money to buy P5 or other headphones, when I listened to P7's sound! Exceptional sound, design, and quality! :-) Gotta love my $399 :)
customer_reviews.author: Wontack Song

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: If you like analog or lossless recordings...these are for you. Crisp and clear sound...the opposite of Bose.
customer_reviews.author: avdrav

customer_reviews.title: The sound, design and quality feel of these headphones ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound, design and quality feel of these headphones are top notch. Unfortunately, the ear cups are so narrow, I would dispute calling these circumaural headphones. The cups rested on either the front of my ear, or the back of my earlobes, resulting in an uncomfortable experience after 30-45 minutes of listening. Returned product.
customer_reviews.author: Elnrik

customer_reviews.title: Love this headphone
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones. Good, neutral sound, with a bit of a bass bump, but not much. Overall a very nice headphone. May sound a bit vailed on some of the highs but to protect your ears.
customer_reviews.author: Stan P.

customer_reviews.title: Give these a few hours of burn-in time before drawing any conclusions. You will NOT be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones sounded a little "anemic" when I first began using them, but after a couple hours of use they really came to life and sound absolutely amazing. The entire sound spectrum is very clear. It has strong, accurate bass without being overpowering. These headphones are so versatile in terms of music genres that they are excellent for listening to all types of music. Build quality is top notch. Comfort is quite good, but not amazing.
customer_reviews.author: PRSnow

customer_reviews.title: I have use this headphone for more than half years ...
customer_reviews.text: I have use this headphone for more than half years, it is works well. I believe that if I will exchange a new headphone, I will still buy this P7.
customer_reviews.author: Chayton-

customer_reviews.title: Excellent clarity. I own and regularly use a set ...
customer_reviews.text: Very lush and full sound. Slightly bass heavy, but not at the expense of mids or highs. Excellent clarity. I own and regularly use a set of Audio Technical M50x and Sennheiser 598 Cs headphones and these sound much better (sound feels more "vibrant" and "full" than the two other headsets) which makes sense due to the price difference. Am definitely glad I picked these up!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Bower

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. The fit is tight but not unbearably so (and my head is huge). I assume it will be more comfortable as it stretches out and settles in. The sound is amazing, very clear with strong bass. High class design, good fit and finish. Quality cable.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Comfort is an issue despite seemingly large ear openings.
customer_reviews.text: The sound seems excellent, but the headphones are just not that comfortable over my ears. I would think for this kind of money I could wear them for hours without experiencing discomfort but they just don't fit that cleanly over my ears which creates some pinching.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Brandt

customer_reviews.title: great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Luxurious build, great sound quality. Has a sturdy purchase on your head (a little tighter fit) than some competing brands in the same price range which is a personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: derek c.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about these headphones. Well worth the price. Being stuck in the airport a couple of months ago, I found myself in one of the electronics places, and tried out another brand. Compared to the crappy sound out of my earbuds, I realized what I was hearing through the latter wasn't music so much as noise. So when I got home, I browsed around, found these, and bought them. Now I can hear music, and they even come ready for the iPhone, with a microphone built in--that was a nice surprise.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Eubanks

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable sound and comfort. I've owned a pair of ...
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable sound and comfort. I've owned a pair of P5s for years and much prefer the over-ear design of the P7s.
customer_reviews.author: David McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Great in all aspects.
customer_reviews.text: Really loving them. Pros: - Stunning balanced sound, making you smile - Exquisite looks, high-class exterior - Supreme built quality, headphones that really last - Easily and beautifully driven by iOS device and computer Con: - Not for the big ears - Require general leather care in order to keep their good looks Conclusion: - If you are looking for cans in this price range for everyday use, i.e. music / podcast / relaxing / enjoying life, BUY them!
customer_reviews.author: Xumei

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Headphones
customer_reviews.text: The headphones sound is amazing. They are well made, comfortable and are very easy to use. Just take into account that the poor sources of music sounds really bad with these.
customer_reviews.author: Rombonauta

customer_reviews.title: Bowers & Wilkins P7 Wireless Review
customer_reviews.text: Excellent headphones! Sound is very balanced and not boomy on the bass. Looking forward to using these on an airplane to see how they hold up to cabin noise. Do wish they would stay on my head when I workout better, but other than that, I am extremely satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: LACRECHA MERRIMAN

customer_reviews.title: Really great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Really great sound quality. Very happy with these headphones. I also own Beats x wireless headphones and don’t get me wrong I’m happy with those too but these are far and away the better wireless headphones. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Berdugo

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones I've ever listened to
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones I've ever listened to. I love the discrete separation of instruments and vocals, great mid range and better bass than I expected. The sound isolation is wonderful - especially in my noisy house infested with teenagers. Even HD tracks on my cell phone sound great! Just bought a headphone USB dac and amp. Will update once I try with that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: I usually do not write reviews but these headphones have driven me to do so. I have only had them 2 days and I am no audiophile. What I can say is that I feel like I have rediscovered music. Everything sounds better through these phones. I cannot describe it! It is amazing! I hear things I have never heard in songs before. Anyway, if you are looking at headphones in this price range you cannot go wrong with these in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl

customer_reviews.title: Liked these headphone except they feel too heavy on my ...
customer_reviews.text: Liked these headphone except they feel too heavy on my head. I am sending these back. I love the sound and the padded ear pads. I would keep them but I feel myself getting a headache when wearing these. I may need to get the P5's.
customer_reviews.author: Cece

customer_reviews.title: 1st Class Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Best wireless headphones I have ever used by far, Comfortable with amazing sound. No issues pairing with iPhone 7+ or desktop. Sound quality on calls is very good. B&W hit a home run with these!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Harden

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones. Just got scuppered by the seller who ...
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones. Just got scuppered by the seller who sent it without the universal cable. had to buy it for another $40.
customer_reviews.author: Meraj Shah

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sound - music I've loved for years is introduced ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm listening as I write this... Experience is just groundbreaking for me. Beautiful sound - music I've loved for years is introduced to me in a brand new way. I have read reviews and they all looked great ... but after now that I have them on my ears - WOW!
customer_reviews.author: Chris A. Frackiewicz

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing! They totally put my Beats to shame
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! They totally put my Beats to shame.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Burcham

customer_reviews.title: ... a couple of pair of headphones these are the best. In fact it was not really close
customer_reviews.text: I bought a couple of pair of headphones these are the best. In fact it was not really close. I travel every week and these make my flights so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Grill Buff

customer_reviews.title: but they are absolutely amazing! The only downside is the lack of noise ...
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit hesitant to order these because of the price tag, but they are absolutely amazing! The only downside is the lack of noise cancelling for flights, but most of the time I'm not on an airplane. Heavy travelers may want to look elsewhere but for anyone else, these are perfect! They fit comfortably and the sound quality is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew M. Uhl

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This a great set of headphones. They also include a 3 months subscription to Bowers and Wilkins Society of Sound. This subscription will allow to download lossless compressed audio format albums.
customer_reviews.author: D. Brenes

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Very nice headphones, work well with the iPhone. Compared to other brands, bass level might be a bit less punchy, probably because these headphones reproduce a more balanced sound and don't over process the bass level.
customer_reviews.author: BUF

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy for travel.
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional sound in a quiet environment. Don’t buy for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: or just relax for enjoyment and for the pleasures of music and art
customer_reviews.text: When you need to concentrate... or just relax for enjoyment and for the pleasures of music and art!
customer_reviews.author: Luiz H.S.de Vasconcellos

customer_reviews.title: My first hi-fi headphones. My first-class hi-fi headphones.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first hi-fi headphones. Fine workmanship and high-grade materials. I feel that sounds at all levels are good. Big sound field. Absolutely first-class hi-fi headphones. But wearing for a long time will chuck. I like to listen to the movie soundtrack, but listening with it on a computer is a waste. It is time to consider buying a hi-fi player.
customer_reviews.author: LLC - Liang Luo from China

customer_reviews.title: Best sound I’ve experienced
customer_reviews.text: Incredible. Best sound I’ve experienced. Music will never be the same.
customer_reviews.author: K.B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Headphones NOT GOOD FOR AIRPLANE TRAVEL
customer_reviews.text: Ok so don't make the mistake of buying these for Airplane use as an alternative to BOSE Q15's Simply said it's worth having two sets one for Travel (BOSE Q15's) and one for Home (B&W P7's) The B&W P7's have done a great job in terms of sound quality, the only down side is that you're not the only one hearing the great sounds produced by these great headphones (A lot of noise leakage) They look great, sound great, and comfortable to wear! I hope this helps! Take Care, :)
customer_reviews.author: Ramesh Ferris

customer_reviews.title: Great sound.
customer_reviews.text: The headphones fit nice and allowed me to do other things in comfort. The sound quality was excellent and worth the money. I am not an expert in sound reproduction but these headphones were good enough for my range of sound.
customer_reviews.author: William Clayton Petty

customer_reviews.title: All is excellent! Sound - excellent
customer_reviews.text: All is excellent! Sound - excellent! Sound isolation - very very good! It's feet very well, and comfortable, so even i can slip at airplane.
customer_reviews.author: Maxim

customer_reviews.title: Love my P7
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sound and excellent build quality. The cord is thicker and seemingly stronger than the cord on the P5, which is nice because one of my P5 cords ended up fraying.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: I am an mid-level audiophile, I have used ton of earphone and headphones. This is a clear winner to use with any device.
customer_reviews.author: Kiran Grandhi

customer_reviews.title: The headphones sound great but I just couldn't justify the cost when I ...
customer_reviews.text: The headphones sound great but I just couldn't justify the cost when I compared them to my old Bose Tri-Port headphones. The quality is astounding. The leather smells amazing. But after wearing them for 1-2 hours my head would begin to hurt because of how much they squeezed it. I really wanted to like these headphones. I'm a huge B&W fan. My home sound system is B&W and I would trade those speakers for anything.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hopek

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sounding, very comfortable, and beautifully built. I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: J. Shaevitz

customer_reviews.title: It very good headphone when l used it with iPhone apple music ...
customer_reviews.text: It very good headphone when l used it with iPhone apple music or Tidal or use pass amplifier headphone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customertheraphan jittalarn

customer_reviews.title: Really good.  Especially for it's price point.
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be happier with these headphones. Excellent range. Your not gonna be spinning discs at a DJ with these but the provide clear, undistorted sound at all appropriate levels. It always helps to have a good DAC though. Your iPhone DAC for the most part is junk.
customer_reviews.author: CBW.

customer_reviews.title: perfect for listening to all kinds of music
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace my Bose Noise Cancelation headphones......perfect for listening to all kinds of music.....Now everything in my house is Bowers & Wilkins.......Sure a little costly but who likes to buy things twice?
customer_reviews.author: Joe L. Jeffrie Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones lows and highs slightly boosted but sounds great.
customer_reviews.text: The best sounding headphones I have. Man what a sound, the lows and highs are some what boosted, so not sure how B&W can say they reproduce the sound accurately but no complaints with the sound. I own Senheiser 595 headphones and these headphones blow them away. These are not open back headphone but rather sealed units. A little on the heavy side but very comfortable. It comes with a cable to be used with a cell phone and works fine with my Iphone 6 Plus and comes with a second cable to be used just as headphones. The Iphone 6 powers the headphones with no problems and is plenty loud.
customer_reviews.author: mrajfura

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sound great with little boom. I wish it came with little better cable for wired connection.
customer_reviews.author: A kumar

customer_reviews.title: Excellent audio!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound. Fit is a little tight which crates a better audio experience but can become tiring after an hour or two of use.
customer_reviews.author: G. Stricklin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound
customer_reviews.text: These are the best headphones I have ever had the luxury of wearing. There's a reason these babies haven't dropped in price, and that's because it is an outstanding product. If you're choosing between these and Beats by Dre, choose these. As a hip-hop aficionado I will say they lack slightly in the bass they provide, but after I paired a headphone amplifier with them I then realized that these are the best things ever. They feel like little fairies are dancing around in your ear and tickling all the right spots.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo the Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice full sound! The universal cord was easy to attatch. Expensive, but worth the money. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey M. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the experience....these head phones are quite comfortable. Thanks B&W for making headphones that are practical....
customer_reviews.author: joseph Kafwariman

customer_reviews.title: If you love music then this is worth it
customer_reviews.text: I hear so much more with these. If you love music then this is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. This was a gift for my son in law. He absolutely loves these headphones. He says they sit nicely on his ears and great sound.
customer_reviews.author: Tanga R. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought what a lot of ppl think are the best headphones, those being the beats studio and seinhiesser momentum...I happily gave them away...you'll have to pry these P7 from my cold dead hands!!!!
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: I usually expect product reviews to be exaggerated, but ...
customer_reviews.text: I usually expect product reviews to be exaggerated, but I assure you the sound and craftsmanship of the P7s will blow past anything you've owned. As a studio artist and Art Director, headphones are a critical tool - I can't imagine using anything else. Props B&W.
customer_reviews.author: Irwin

customer_reviews.title: the things I heard after using these was amazing. It's about the details with the P7's
customer_reviews.text: Truly life changing, the things I heard after using these was amazing. It's about the details with the P7's!!
customer_reviews.author: Andre A. Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Best sounq quality Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Best. Bluetooth Headphones and best sound quality at this price
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: I received a defective product
customer_reviews.text: I received a defective product One earpiece has a steady twist
customer_reviews.author: Idan assa

customer_reviews.title: JFC, this is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I've had a lot of headphones over the years. Currently I've got Grado 125s, Audio Technica ATH-M50x (which are amazing), and a few others but I just got these P7s today and plugged them in to my new DragonFly and .... Wow. This combination is far beyond anything I've ever heard. The clarity, separation, and fidelity across the whole range is simply amazing. No amount of hyperbolic praise would even do it justice. Get a pair of these (and a Dragonfly if you don't have one) and you will be absolutely blown away.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Wish List : please have an option of all black color(matte black stainless steel) including its logo.
customer_reviews.text: Wish stainless steel matte finish option(black) than shiny stainless logo and trims. Not so much fast and tight representation of low frequency spectrum.
customer_reviews.author: W. Kim

customer_reviews.title: I purchased these on a whim after coming to the ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these on a whim after coming to the realization that I may never have a $75,000 stereo system I've began to focus on headphones. After just one listen I have begun to question why I ever thought such a system was needed. Start with these and I think you will find many if not most cans in the same price range or above just don't compare.
customer_reviews.author: My 2 cents...

customer_reviews.title: Comfort is near perfect, and likely will be once I get a ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for an over thebear solution for private listening for years. All the in ear buds I've used have always been fatiguing and uncomfortable after a few hours, and have awful sound quality. I hesitated to pony up the dollars for these P7s, especially the markup for BT. But as I listen to music tonight I can tell you it's worth every dollar. Highs are crisp, lows are profound. Clarity and balance are unparalleled. Comfort is near perfect, and likely will be once I get a second to figure that out. These are the most complete solution to listening you'll need.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh M. Ehrenberg

customer_reviews.title: Best wireless headphones on the market bar none
customer_reviews.text: Best wireless headphones on the market bar none, amazing sound and quality also the way it has been done the leather steel and everything wow. Worth every dollar
customer_reviews.author: Kozlík Matěj

product_meta.title: Bowers & Wilkins P7 Wired Over Ear Headphones, Black
product_meta.description: Style:Wired| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingWith P7, everything is designed to allow you to lose yourself in music. Bass is tight, vocals are precisely defined, and there's a wonderful sense of space, balance and clarity across the whole frequency range. At the same time, the over-ear design and snugly-fitting ear pads ensure you become completely immersed in your listening. Because when you're hearing sound this good, you don't want anything to interrupt your enjoyment.
feature_bullets: With P7, we have created a headphone driver that works more like the drive unit in a hi-fi speaker, with a diaphragm focused purely on the job it's supposed to do: generate sound. Which means a drive unit with a more precise, controlled movement. Connectivity Technology: Wired

P7's ear pads feature a dual cavity cushion design that helps the pads mold to the contours of the wearer's head. This design maintains a consistent volume of air between the drive unit and the surface of the ear at both sides of the head.
Not only is stereo imaging enhanced, but the sound is optimized for every listener. Frequency range-10Hz to 20kHz

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars614 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
